raw_answer: 试题解析:如图;AD=6m,AB=21m,DE=2m;由于DE//BC,所以△ADE~△ABC,得:\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{AD}{AB},即\frac{2}{BC}=\frac{6}{21},解得:BC=7m,故树的高度为7m.故选A.
